channel.title: [PI] dwarf multicannon
channel.description: I followed a snippet from here (http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/snippets/368251-pi-dwarf-multi-cannon-base.html), fixed all the problems that ocurred, got it to set up, but it doesn't shoot at the npcs. Can anyone help me with this?

item.title: [PI] dwarf multicannon
item.dc:creator: @Pkor159 Pkor159
item.description:
@Pkor159 wrote:

Driman Rune:

If you did that, that means you didn’t add it to clicknpc or attacking npcs.

Ok how do i do that?[quote=“runescape sucks, post:3, topic:527807”][quote author=Pkor159 link=topic=646557.msg4348182#msg4348182 date=1376227365]
I followed a snippet from here
(http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/google/snippets/368251-pi-dwarf-multi-cannon-base.html), fixed all the problems that ocurred, got it to set up, but it doesn’t shoot at the npcs.
Can anyone help me with this?
[/quote]
If you look through the enitre tutorial, you will not notice anything for npcs, and you will notice the title of that particular topic says base.[/quote]
Can anyone help me finish it?

Read full topic
